job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: pDescription ppbrppstrongMachine LearningMLstrongnbspstrongEngineer strongppstrongLocation Remote Can be Anywhere Preferably in West Coast or someone who can work in PSTstrongppnbspppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbsp5 years of industry experience or a PhD  2 years industry experience in applied Machine learningppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspStrong coding skills in PythonJavaScala or equivalentppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspExperience with distributed data processing tools like Hive Spark Airflow and popular ML frameworks like Tensorflow or Pytorch is preferredppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspSolid understanding of engineering best practices and complexities of models in productionppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspExperience developing and productionizing machine learning models is a plusppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspExperience with Docker Kubernetes Spark is a plusppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspExperience with distributed data processing tools like Hive Spark Airflow is a plusppnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspIndustry experience building endtoend Machine Learning Infrastructure a bigplusppnbspppbrp
